name: Solar Force
description:
This game was made for the One Button Game Jam, all you need to play is your spacebar! (including menus)

The music used for anyone interested (non-copyright free download):

Menu: Jorge Hernandez - Chopsticks

Game: Jeremy Blake - Powerup!

Some top development scores (can you beat them? :o)

  • Grace (myself): 63
  • Ethan: 67
  • Martin:  56
  • JokiBlue:  70

This is my first go at unity C# and first game jam! Hope you enjoy it :)
